item.title: Creating a Nextflow Pipeline
item.description: Introduction Pipelines / Workflows It’s possible to convert a viash component into a NextFlow module. Viash uses NextFlow’s DSL2 for this, effectively creating modules that can be imported in a main.nf pipeline definition that deals with the logic of the pipeline rather than the low-level machinery. When it comes to this low-level machinery and the way viash creates a module, we refer to the step-by-step introduction about DiFlow. Parallelization NextFlow, as any other pipeline platform is able to run tasks in parallel if the pipeline logic allows for that.
